text: Napoleon is here to stay! Don't mess with me, or else!
Barn meeting Tuesday after Jones' rounds. #CommunityMeeting #IHadADream
This Wednesday morning, reading lessons. Open to all. #ReadThoseCommandments
DO NOT feed the hens under any circumstances. They are refusing to work for the greater good. #EggsForAll #GiveUsYourEggs
Remember the flag raising ceremony this Sunday. #AnimalFarm #Animalism #LoveAFlag
Just for fun!  What is your Animal Farm name?  Ask Muriel to read it to you if you need help. Reply with your new name! #JustForFun #WhatsYourName #DistractionTactic
I am now President. Thanks to all who voted for me. It's an honour. #PresidentNapoleon #LongLiveNapoleon #NapoleonRocks
Thanks for the generous contribution of milk and apples to the pigs. #PigBrainWorkers #FarmSuccess
Do you want to build a windmill? #Frozen3 #WarmWinter #Teamwork
Every afternoon, meet me in the barn for a reading session.  Everyone welcome. #Reading #Community
Sorry everyone, gonna be late for work again.  Will make it up to you. #Overslept #Teamwork
Thank you everyone for the Order of the Green Banner. #IDeserveIt #GoMe
